name: San Mig Light
description: San Mig Light is the country's leading low calorie beer with only 100 calories per 330ml serving. That's why you'll feel so light as you enjoy its full beer flavor that hits just right...

name: BLACK Eagle Beer
description: The ultimate reward to a hard day's work is Gold Eagle Beer. It is moderately light bodied, yet flavorful, hopped just enough to give a little bite on the finish bringing out an over-all

name: Brew Kettle
description: Brew Kettle Belgian Witbier Style Beer is an aromatic and refreshing brew with hints of white wheat and orange, giving it a crisp and smooth taste. Light-bodied and easy to drink, garnish your bottle of Brew Kettle with an orange slice and savor that full flavored experience. An inspired and enjoyable beer brewed to be different with you in mind...

name: Fat Pauly's Ales & Lagers
description: Fat Pauly's Hand-crafted Ales & Lagers is a proud local brand that makes fresh home-brewed beers using both the finest imported brew grade malt and some local indegenous ingredients such as Timoga Spring waters, and wild Putyukan Honey...

name: Palaw'An
description: An old but popular German-style beer with our equally famous Palawan honey from the Southern Palawan tribe, Palaw'an. Pale color, light body and smooth mouthfeel with a subtle floral character...
